pageSetting.title: 机构对比分析

attribute.value: select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_jg order by zbpx

select.isEqual: select t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.tjz as tjz,t.dbz as dbz,cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2)) as zl, f_numtochar(case when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz<>0 then 100 when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz=0 then 0 else cast(cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2))/t.dbz*100 as decimal(19,2)) end)||'%' as bl,t.bzzwmc as bz,t.sdbs,t.tjkj,t.zbmc from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,sum(yjzb.tjz) tjz,sum(yjzb.dbz) as dbz,bz.bzzwmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,fxzb.zbmc from khdx_zb fxzb inner join ( select $qsrq$ as tjrq,zbdh,sdbs,bz,tjkj,khdxdh,zbz as tjz,0 as dbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ where zbdh=$zbdh$ and bz='$bz$' and sdbs='$sdbs$' and tjkj='$tjkj$' and tjrq=$qsrq$ union all select $jsrq$ as tjrq,zbdh,sdbs,bz,tjkj,khdxdh,0 as tjz,zbz as dbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ where zbdh=$zbdh$ and bz='$bz$' and sdbs='$sdbs$' and tjkj='$tjkj$' and tjrq=$jsrq$ ) yjzb on yjzb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=yjzb.bz inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=yjzb.khdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz=yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc='ZBSDBS' left join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz=yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc='TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=yjzb.khdxdh inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' where 1=1 and fxzb.zbdh=$fxzb$ and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,fxzb.zbpx,bz.bzzwmc,dmms_sdbs.dmms,dmms_tjkj.dmms,fxzb.zbmc ) t order by t.jgdh

select t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.tjz as tjz,t.dbz as dbz,cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2)) as zl, F_NumToChar(case when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz<>0 then 100 when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz=0 then 0 else cast(cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2))/t.dbz*100 as decimal(19,2)) end)||'%' as bl,t.khzbmc from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,yjzb.khzbmc,sum(yjzb.tjz) tjz,sum(yjzb.dbz) as dbz from( select $qsrq$ as tjrq,khzb.khzbmc,yjzb.khdxdh,yjzb.zbz as tjz,0 as dbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on yjzb.zbdh = khzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = khzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs=khzb.sdbs and yjzb.tjkj = khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ and tjrq=$qsrq$ union all select $jsrq$ as tjrq,khzb.khzbmc,yjzb.khdxdh,0 as tjz,yjzb.zbz as dbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on yjzb.zbdh = khzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = khzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs=khzb.sdbs and yjzb.tjkj = khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ and tjrq=$jsrq$ ) yjzb inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,yjzb.khzbmc ) t order by t.jgdh

sqlMap.select:
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select count(1) from ( select t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.tjz as tjz,t.dbz as dbz,cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2)) as zl, f_numtochar(case when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz<>0 then 100 when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz=0 then 0 else cast(cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2))/t.dbz*100 as decimal(19,2)) end)||'%' as bl,t.bzzwmc as bz,t.sdbs,t.tjkj,t.zbmc from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,sum(yjzb.tjz) tjz,sum(yjzb.dbz) as dbz,bz.bzzwmc, dmms_sdbs.dmms as sdbs,dmms_tjkj.dmms as tjkj,fxzb.zbmc from khdx_zb fxzb inner join ( select $qsrq$ as tjrq,zbdh,sdbs,bz,tjkj,khdxdh,zbz as tjz,0 as dbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ where zbdh=$zbdh$ and bz='$bz$' and sdbs='$sdbs$' and tjkj='$tjkj$' and tjrq=$qsrq$ union all select $jsrq$ as tjrq,zbdh,sdbs,bz,tjkj,khdxdh,0 as tjz,zbz as dbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ where zbdh=$zbdh$ and bz='$bz$' and sdbs='$sdbs$' and tjkj='$tjkj$' and tjrq=$jsrq$ ) yjzb on yjzb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh inner join csb_bz bz on bz.bz=yjzb.bz inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh=yjzb.khdxdh left join csb_dmms dmms_sdbs on dmms_sdbs.dmz=yjzb.sdbs and dmms_sdbs.dmmc='ZBSDBS' left join csb_dmms dmms_tjkj on dmms_tjkj.dmz=yjzb.tjkj and dmms_tjkj.dmmc='TJKJ' inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh=yjzb.khdxdh inner join khdx_zblb zblb on zblb.zbdh=fxzb.zbdh and zblb.jsrq=29991231 and zblb.ywlb='$ywlb$' where 1=1 and fxzb.zbdh=$fxzb$ and jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,fxzb.zbpx,bz.bzzwmc,dmms_sdbs.dmms,dmms_tjkj.dmms,fxzb.zbmc ) t order by t.jgdh
select t.jgdh,t.jgmc,t.tjz as tjz,t.dbz as dbz,cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2)) as zl, F_NumToChar(case when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz<>0 then 100 when (t.dbz is null or t.dbz=0) and t.tjz=0 then 0 else cast(cast((t.tjz-t.dbz) as decimal(19,2))/t.dbz*100 as decimal(19,2)) end)||'%' as bl,t.khzbmc from ( select jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,yjzb.khzbmc,sum(yjzb.tjz) tjz,sum(yjzb.dbz) as dbz from( select $qsrq$ as tjrq,khzb.khzbmc,yjzb.khdxdh,yjzb.zbz as tjz,0 as dbz from yjzb_jg_$tjnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on yjzb.zbdh = khzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = khzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs=khzb.sdbs and yjzb.tjkj = khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ and tjrq=$qsrq$ union all select $jsrq$ as tjrq,khzb.khzbmc,yjzb.khdxdh,0 as tjz,yjzb.zbz as dbz from yjzb_jg_$dbnf$ yjzb inner join khfa_khzb_jg khzb on yjzb.zbdh = khzb.zbdh and yjzb.bz = khzb.bz and yjzb.sdbs=khzb.sdbs and yjzb.tjkj = khzb.tjkj where 1=1 and khzb.khzbdh = $khzb$ and tjrq=$jsrq$ ) yjzb inner join khdx_jg jg on jg.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh inner join table(FN_GETSJJG_JAVA_QX($sysdate$,$login_khdxdh$,0)) qx on qx.khdxdh = yjzb.khdxdh where jg.khdxdh in ($jgkhdxdh$) group by jg.jgdh,jg.jgmc,yjzb.khzbmc ) t order by t.jgdh ) t
/**!mycat:datanode=$db$**/ select khzbdh as KEY,khzbmc as VALUE from khfa_khzb_jg order by zbpx

finger.ySeriesDesc: 统计日指标值,对比日指标值,增量
统计日指标值,对比日指标值,增量
